message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you consider that?
Bob, thanks for the offer, but I can't go as low as $9,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,800?
